context: Regional bank (2,000 employees) modernizing customer onboarding to reduce fraud and improve user experience

request.purpose: Implement digital identity verification system for account opening and transactions
request.justification: Current manual verification processes causing customer abandonment and fraud losses

decision_process.outcome: Requirements aligned with AML/KYC standards and data protection regulations
Jumio selected for biometric verification over Onfido and Veriff

business_impact.expected_benefits: 60% reduction in onboarding time, 30% decrease in fraud losses, improved customer satisfaction
risk_factors: Customer acceptance of new verification methods
